verses.verse: Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> were <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> a <S%H4726>spring<s%> of <S%H1832>tears,<s%> that I might <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> for the <S%H2491>slain<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people!<s%>

Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> I had in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> a lodging <S%H4411>place<s%> of wayfaring <S%H732>men;<s%> that I might <S%H5800>leave<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> from <S%H5003>them!<s%> for they are all adulterers, an <S%H6116>assembly<s%> of treacherous <S%H898>men.<s%>

They <S%H1869>bend<s%> their <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> as their <S%H7198>bow,<s%> for <S%H8267>falsehood;<s%> and they are grown <S%H1396>strong<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> but not for <S%H530>truth:<s%> for they <S%H3318>proceed<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%> to <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and they <S%H3045>don't<s%> know <S%H5002>me,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and <S%H982>don't<s%> trust in any <S%H251>brother;<s%> for every <S%H251>brother<s%> will <S%H6117>utterly<s%> <S%H6117>supplant,<s%> and every <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> about with <S%H7400>slanders.<s%>

They will <S%H2048>deceive<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and will not <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H571>truth:<s%> they have <S%H3925>taught<s%> their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>lies;<s%> they <S%H3811>weary<s%> themselves to commit <S%H5753>iniquity.<s%>
Your <S%H3427>habitation<s%> is in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit;<s%> through <S%H4820>deceit<s%> they <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H5002>me,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H6884>Behold,<s%> I will melt <S%H974>them,<s%> and try <S%H6213>them;<s%> for how should I deal <S%H6440>with<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H5971>people?<s%>

Their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is a <S%H7819>deadly<s%> <S%H2671>arrow;<s%> it <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H4820>deceit:<s%> one <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H7965>peaceably<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> with his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> but in his <S%H7130>heart<s%> he <S%H7760>lays<s%> wait for <S%H696>him.<s%>
Shall I not <S%H6485>visit<s%> them for these <S%H5002>things?<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> shall not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on such a nation as <S%H1471>this?<s%>

For the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> will I take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H1065>weeping<s%> and <S%H5092>wailing,<s%> and for the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation,<s%> because they are burned <S%H3341>up,<s%> so that <S%H376>none<s%> <S%H5674>passes<s%> <S%H8085>through;<s%> neither can men hear the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H4735>livestock;<s%> both the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> and the <S%H929>animals<s%> are <S%H5074>fled,<s%> they are <S%H1980>gone.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1530>heaps,<s%> a <S%H4583>dwelling<s%> place of <S%H8577>jackals;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> without <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>

Who is the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> that may <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H6310>this?<s%> Who is he to whom the mouth of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> that he may <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H776>it?<s%> Why is the land <S%H6>perished<s%> and burned <S%H3341>up<s%> like a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> so that none passes <S%H5674>through?<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> Because they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> my <S%H8451>law<s%> which I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8085>them,<s%> and have not obeyed my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> neither walked <S%H1980>therein,<s%>

but have <S%H3212>walked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H8307>stubbornness<s%> of their own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1168>Baals,<s%> which their <S%H1>fathers<s%> taught <S%H3925>them;<s%>

therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H398>Behold,<s%> I will feed <S%H5971>them,<s%> even this people, with <S%H3939>wormwood,<s%> and give them <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H7219>gall<s%> to <S%H8248>drink.<s%>

I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them also among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> whom neither they nor their <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H3045>known;<s%> and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3615>them,<s%> until I have consumed them.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H995>Consider,<s%> and <S%H7121>call<s%> for the mourning <S%H6969>women,<s%> that they may <S%H935>come;<s%> and <S%H7971>send<s%> for the <S%H2450>skillful<s%> <S%H935>women,<s%> that they may come:

and let them make <S%H4116>haste,<s%> and take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5092>wailing<s%> for <S%H5869>us,<s%> that our eyes may run <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H1832>tears,<s%> and our <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> gush <S%H5140>out<s%> with <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

For a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H5092>wailing<s%> is <S%H8085>heard<s%> out of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> How are we <S%H7703>ruined!<s%> we are <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H954>confounded,<s%> because we have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> because they have cast <S%H7993>down<s%> our <S%H4908>dwellings.<s%>

Yet <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you <S%H802>women,<s%> and let your <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H3947>receive<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> and <S%H3925>teach<s%> your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H5092>wailing,<s%> and <S%H802>everyone<s%> her <S%H7468>neighbor<s%> <S%H7015>lamentation.<s%>

For <S%H4194>death<s%> has come <S%H5927>up<s%> into our <S%H2474>windows,<s%> it is <S%H935>entered<s%> into our <S%H759>palaces;<s%> to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H5768>children<s%> from <S%H2351>outside,<s%> and the young <S%H970>men<s%> from the <S%H7339>streets.<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak,<s%> Thus <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> The dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> as <S%H1828>dung<s%> on the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field,<s%> and as the <S%H5995>handful<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H7114>harvester;<s%> and none shall gather <S%H622>them.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H2450>Don't<s%> let the wise man <S%H1984>glory<s%> in his <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> neither let the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> man <S%H1984>glory<s%> in his <S%H1369>might,<s%> <S%H6223>don't<s%> let the rich man <S%H1984>glory<s%> in his <S%H6239>riches;<s%>

but let him who <S%H1984>glories<s%> <S%H1984>glory<s%> in <S%H7919>this,<s%> that he has understanding, and <S%H3045>knows<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> that I am Yahweh who <S%H6213>exercises<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> <S%H4941>justice,<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> in the <S%H776>earth:<s%> for in these things I <S%H2654>delight,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H3117>Behold,<s%> the days <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> all those who are <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> in <S%H6190>uncircumcision:<s%>

<S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and all that have the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of their hair cut <S%H7112>off,<s%> who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> for all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
